headline: Smart Learning Market Surges to $155.2 billion by 2029 - Dominated by IBM (US), Samsung (South Korea), Adobe (US)
summary: Delray Beach, FL, Oct. 27, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- According to MarketsandMarkets™, the Smart Learning Market is projected to grow from USD 67.1 billion in 2024 to USD 155.2 billion by 2029 at a CAGR of 18.3% during the forecast period. The rapid advancements in technology are revolutionizing the smart learning market. AI-powered tools are enhancing personalized learning experiences by adapting educational content to meet individual students’ needs, thereby making teaching and learning more eff
